## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case

Describe the problem or use case this feature would solve. Why do you need this?

## Proposed Solution

How would you like this feature to work? Be as specific as possible.

## Alternative Solutions

Have you considered any alternative solutions or workarounds?

## Examples

If applicable, provide examples from other software or mockups of how this could work.

## Implementation Ideas

(Optional) If you have ideas about how this could be implemented technically, share them here.

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or mockups about the feature request here.
